entries.new_old_fbase_refunded: Building Lots and Faction Points for an old Faction Base have been refunded. You have been given %DI lots back.
entries.faction_base_one_more: You have placed a faction base. You can place one more base.
entries.faction_base_refunded_one: A faction base you placed has been destroyed and you have been refunded a base unit. You can now place an additional base.
entries.faction_base_unit_last: You have placed a faction base. You have now used up your faction base allotment and cannot place any more, without some of the others going away first.
entries.faction_base_unit_used: You have placed a faction base. You can now place up to %DI more bases.
entries.given_extra_bases: Congratulations! In addition to the base that you purchased, we have given you two additional bases. They are:
entries.not_enough_base_units: You do not have any base units allotments left, and so cannot place this factional base.
entries.faction_base_unit_refunded: A faction base you placed has been destroyed and you have been refunded a base unit. You can now place up to %DI bases.
entries.old_fbase_refunded: Building Lots and Faction Points for an old Faction Base have been refunded. You have been given %DI lots back and have been granted %DF faction points.
entries.prose_not_neutral: You cannot use %TT if you are neutral or on leave.
entries.destroy_turrets: You cannot enter this HQ until all Turrets have been destroyed.
entries.gcw_tied: Neither the Rebellion or the Empire has the advantage.
entries.gcw_rebel_ahead: The Rebellion has the advantage over the Empire.
entries.gcw_imperial_ahead: The Empire is has the advantage over the Rebellion.
entries.prose_wrong_faction: You must be declared to the %TO faction to use that %TT.
entries.minefield_exit: You have left the perimeter of an enemy minefield.
entries.minefield_near: You have breached the perimeter of an enemy minefield.
entries.no_build_inside: You cannot deploy this object inside another structure.
entries.no_build_area: You are within a no-build area. Please try this action elsewhere.
entries.prose_nsf_lots: Insufficient Lots: You lack the required %DI available lots to place this item.
entries.prose_be_declared_faction: You must be a declared %TO to use %TT.
entries.prose_be_declared: You must be declared to a faction to use %TT.
